titleInfo.title: 'Sketch of the Attack on Bushire. December 10th. 1856'

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:321 x 259 mm, on sheet 409 x 339 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Calcutta, Lithographed by H.M. Smith at the Surveyor Generals Office.Distinctive Features:The positions of the British fleet on the 10th of December 1856 shown in red, Persian defencesâ€™ coloured yellow.Depths shown by soundings recorded in fathoms at low water.Inscriptions:Signed by the Major Deputy Surveyor General at bottom right.
